title: FM greets Christian community on Easter
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 04 (APP): Foreign Minister Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi Sunday greeted the Christian community on the occasion of Easter.
The foreign minister tweeted “Wishing all those celebrating a very Happy Easter”.
Wishing all those celebrating a very Happy Easter. #Easter
— Shah Mahmood Qureshi (@SMQureshiPTI) April 4, 2021
The Christian community of the country is celebrating Easter on Sunday.
